wikipedia_page.main: Odo William Leopold Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill,  (20 February 1829 – 25 August 1884), styled Lord Odo Russell between 1872 and 1881, was a British diplomat and the first British Ambassador to the German Empire.

response: *Lady Emily Theresa (1843–1927), married Odo Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill.

link_mentions.page: Odo William Leopold Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill

response: * Odo Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill (1829–1884), British diplomat

Russell married Elizabeth Anne Rawdon, granddaughter of Elizabeth Rawdon, Countess of Moira.  The couple were the parents of Blanche Russell, Francis Russell, 9th Duke of Bedford, Lord Arthur John Edward Russell and Odo Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill.
* Odo Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill (1829–1884), British diplomat
* Emily Theresa Villiers († 1927), daughter of George Villiers, 4th Earl of Clarendon, married Odo Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill.
* Monument to Odo Russell, 1st Baron Ampthill († 1884) by Sir Joseph Edgar Boehm.
